name: Darkness Ritual: Impasse
description:
Secrets, mysteries and related rituals and ceremonies. You will now experience this fate. This is not the time to pay the price for witnessing a mysterious ritual, because it is time to experience what has not been experienced.

In this story consisting of seven chapters, you witness a ritual moment and find yourself in this mysterious world while trying to escape. The only way out of here is to follow a path that doesn't exist. You will challenge your skills and psychedelic impulses in this game, where we try to reflect the Horror-Platform elements in the best way, which is one of the rare examples of its kind.
